response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This exceptional item carries a unique value, tailored specifically to meet the needs and desires of its owner. Considering its unparalleled quality and functionality, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $18,000. This investment not only secures an item of high value but also opens doors to a world of possibilities that align with your aspirations. We believe this is a remarkable opportunity for both of us to create something extraordinary together.", "product_price": 18000}
